name: Darkness over Hemwick
description:
Note. Dosbox is required for play.  Dosbox is free!!!

Oldschool 1980s style fantasy adventure. Engaging storyline, unique textures and original ambient soundtrack. 3 different character classes to choose from. Extensive lore to explore throughout the story. With magic, weapons and armor upgrades.

 Game folder is zipped to 16mb 42mb when unzipped

Readme enclosed in files!!! Feedback welcomed
